Bullet train or Better trains - What does India need?

 

INDIA needs  Better trains . the reason is to need better trains, number of people are travelling trains only they prefer better trains not bullet trains. in INDIA there is so many trains. people are travelling to long distance they are travel in better trains.  I think in bullet trains there is not  comfortable to travel,in better trains all are travel means normal people, no need to reserve the seats. in better trains need to every people in INDIA. recently our prime minister NARENDRA MODI was lunched in trains.  In better trains ticket cost is reasonble cost. in that trains there is good infrastrastructure like fans, seats and recently is availbel to electricty,before electricity is only in reservation compatrments only,now it is availble for general compatrments. trains are very importnat to aged people.they are not comfortable in buss or other.

                                                                                                                                               INDIAN Railway departmnet are very nice,they prefer to aged people like in resrved people they will give in lower seats. now a days electicity trains are having in india.like the power of using to move the trian engine. INDIA is a best to railway department.rcently increasing many trains. it is better to travel .thre is flexability,and comfortable to evry one. MAHATMA GANDI`s dream to seen the clean INDIA. he says the SANITORY IS IMPORTANT THAN THE INDEPENDANCY.  we have to control the pollution,there is no pollution on using the trains.

                                                                                                                         prime minister says in india no pollution on2019.we have to clean and green our society.the people are most using trains only. recently increse more trains . before in INDIA  is having limited trains like one are two trains in the same places.at present there is more than that previous trains.they need more trains in INDIA. we have to improve the railway stations, like expanding the railway stations. now days it is happening but not all railway stations htere is main junctions only.using the trains there is  90% no problem.in 10% its happend for peoples negligence. it is a safe journey to the peoole  in better trains having ladies comprtment and handicaped compartment, it is very usefull to the people.and there is a guardian for ladies comprtment it is also good idea to carefull to the people. in railways department there is benfit to the people is trnsfring the goods vehicles in better trains. it is very useful to the country.and it must have encourage the better trains in INDIA.

                         In Railway department is having ticket collecter and helper to the issues. and Indian railway need to change to food facilities.to clean the rest rooms on that compartments.  in trains we can travel faster.it is advantage of to travel in trains only.                            

                                                                                                                                Better trains are very usegull to the people.and to know the trains are very important to use for people. in trians are using that the there is no pollution .we have to use the trains mostly.ther is benefit to our self it is reasnble ticket for every one.in better trains having comfortable seats for ladies and aged people and handiacaped persons.
